verbose_text: Programmed cell death-1 (PD-1) are hyperexpressed on CD8+ cells, relying on previous studies interfering in PD-1 / PD-1 ligand improves antiviral activity of T cells [XREF_BIBR], as an example on mice model with viral infection blockage of PD-1 / PD-L1 inhibitory pathway restored ability of CD8 T cells to undergo proliferation, secrete cytokines, kill infected cells, and decrease viral load [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: PD-L1 inhibitory pathway restored ability of CD8 T cells to undergo proliferation
